entities.description: The instance where a vehicle is staffed by two officers.
The instance where a vehicle is staffed by one officer working alone.
The instance where a vehicle is staffed by one officer with assistance.
The instance where a detective or specialist is assigned alone.
The instance where a detective or specialist is assigned with assistance.
Other situations where individuals are working alone.
Other situations where individuals are working with assistance.
Instances where data is missing or not recorded.
Originating Agency Identifier (ORI) for other jurisdictions.

relationships.description: Indicates the staffing of vehicles with two officers.
Indicates the staffing of vehicles with one officer working alone.
Indicates the staffing of vehicles with one officer working with assistance.
Indicates when detectives or specialists are assigned alone.
Indicates when detectives or specialists are assigned with assistance.
Indicates other situations where individuals are working alone.
Indicates other situations where individuals are working with assistance.
Indicates instances where data is missing or not recorded.
Indicates the Originating Agency Identifier (ORI) for other jurisdictions.
